See [this link](https://github.com/samanthacsik/samanthacsik.github.io/blob/main/posts/2022-10-24-quarto-blogs/index.qmd) for how to add a bibliography [This link](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/article-layout.html) is useful for setting up and customising page content! ::: {.cell .column-screen} ```{.r .cell-code} library(leaflet) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'leaflet' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
